img.alt:
We’d like to send a very special congratulations to 3rd & 4th grade science teacher, Ms. Ashlee Bush-Davis, who was honored today with a New Orleans Excellence In Teaching award! We’re incredibly proud — and inspired by your outstanding work. 📚
Thanks to @orleansparishschoolboard Superintendent Dr. Henderson Lewis and his team for delivering the award to Ms. Bush-Davis at DTA. #renewschools #nola #nolaed #noeta
